entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 5:23 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
